item.title: 金融时报》称德国商业银行考虑裁员作为战略调整的一部分
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》援引知情人士的话报道，德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）正在考虑裁员并将职位转移到德国境外，作为该银行将于 2 月 13 日提交的战略更新的一部分。【原文：Commerzbank AG is looking at job cuts and moving roles outside Germany as part of a strategy update that the lender is set to present on Feb. 13, the Financial Times reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称英国考虑提高外国国有媒体所有权上限
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引未具名消息人士的话报道称，英国正在考虑将其新闻机构的外国国有所有权门槛提高一倍。【原文：The UK is considering doubling the proposed threshold of foreign state ownership of its news outlets, the Financial Times reported, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: 非洲最大经济体即将迎来转机
item.description: 对于发展中国家来说，实现可使大部分人口摆脱贫困的持续增长通常是一项挑战；历史上的不平等和社会压力往往是成功的巨大障碍。【原文：For a developing country, achieving sustained growth that can lift much of the population out of poverty is usually a challenge—there often are historical inequities and societal strains posing sizable obstacles to success.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：美国和英国通胀降温
item.description: 上个月，美国和英国的通胀指标有所放缓，支撑了大幅下挫后的债券价格，并增强了对降息的押注。【原文：Measures of inflation eased in the US and UK last month, propping up bond prices after deep selloffs and bolstering bets on interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 印尼可能需要 60 亿美元扩大免费午餐计划
item.description: 据一位高级官员称，印尼今年可能需要追加100万亿印尼盾（61亿美元），以扩大总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的免费午餐计划，使其在年底前覆盖近8300万人。【原文：Indonesia may need an additional 100 trillion rupiah ($6.1 billion) this year to expand President Prabowo Subianto’s free lunch program to cover nearly 83 million people by year-end, according to a top official.】

item.title: 汉莎航空敲定收购意大利 ITA 航空公司 41% 股份的交易
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）上周五晚些时候完成了对意大利航空公司 ITA Airways 少数股权的收购，此前该公司曾于 2023 年 1 月首次向其竞争对手提出收购要约。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG completed the acquisition of a minority stake in Italian carrier ITA Airways late on Friday after first making an offer for its competitor in January 2023.】

item.title: 美国向印度领导人呼吁制定更宽松的核责任法
item.description: 即将离任的美国驻印度大使说，美国已与印度各政治派别的领导人进行了交谈，希望他们重新审视这个南亚国家对核反应堆制造商的严格规定。【原文：The US has spoken with Indian leaders across the political spectrum to get them to review the South Asian nation’s strict regulations for makers of nuclear reactors, the outgoing US ambassador to India said.】

item.title: 推动比特币发展：瑞士央行的正统观念与瑞士加密货币人群的对抗
item.description: 如果瑞士的比特币传教士们能够如愿以偿，那么瑞士将对其与货币的关系进行一番自我反思。【原文：Switzerland is set for some self-reflection on its relationship with money, if the country’s Bitcoin evangelists get their way.】

item.title: 斯塔默的 "复兴十年 "已落后于计划进度
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）敦促人们耐心等待他承诺的英国 "复兴十年"。最近伦敦金融市场的波动表明，时间是他所没有的奢侈品。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer has urged patience in what he promises will be a “decade of renewal” for the UK. The recent swings in City of London financial markets show that time is a luxury he doesn’t have.】

item.title: 越南 VinFast 将于 2025 年在印度首次推出两款汽车
item.description: 电动汽车制造商 VinFast Auto Ltd. 表示，计划今年晚些时候开始在南亚国家销售两款印度制造的汽车，这标志着越南汽车制造商首次进入世界第三大汽车市场。【原文：Electric vehicle maker VinFast Auto Ltd. said it plans to begin selling two made-in-India cars in the South Asian country later this year, marking the Vietnamese carmaker’s debut in the world’s third-biggest car market.】

item.title: 前阿尔切戈斯首席财务官与美方一致认为他应被判处八年监禁
item.description: 据 Archegos Capital Management 的 Patrick Halligan 律师向法院提交的一份文件显示，他和联邦检察官已就他在 2021 年价值 360 亿美元的对冲基金倒闭事件中所扮演的角色达成一致，应被判处八年监禁。【原文：Archegos Capital Management’s Patrick Halligan and federal prosecutors have agreed he should be sentenced to eight years in prison for his role in the 2021 collapse of the $36 billion hedge fund, according to a court filing by his lawyer.】

item.title: 澳大利亚因飓风威胁关闭最大铁矿石港口
item.description: 由于西澳大利亚州皮尔巴拉地区近海热带气旋的发展，澳大利亚最大的铁矿石出口中心黑德兰港已经关闭。【原文：Australia’s largest iron ore export hub Port Hedland has been closed as a tropical cyclone develops offshore the Pilbara region of Western Australia state.】

item.title: 部长称美国贸易战威胁马来西亚芯片需求
item.description: 马来西亚投资、贸易和工业部长扎弗鲁尔-阿齐兹（Zafrul Aziz）表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策有可能阻碍全球经济增长，削弱对马来西亚芯片的需求。【原文：US President-elect Donald Trump’s policies risk stunting global growth and weakening demand for Malaysian chips, according to Malaysia’s Investment, Trade and Industry Minister Zafrul Aziz.】

item.title: TikTok 表示在白宫未明确表态的情况下将于 1 月 19 日 "黑暗化
item.description: TikTok 表示，除非拜登政府向维持其可用性的服务提供商发出明确声明，否则它将被迫于 1 月 19 日在美国 "停机"。【原文：TikTok said it will be forced to “go dark” in the US on Jan. 19 unless there is a clear statement from the Biden administration to service providers that are maintaining its availability.】

item.title: 墨西哥成立汽车供应商 "特别工作组 "遏制中国进口汽车
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长周五在底特律举行的一次私人会议上对一群汽车供应商说，墨西哥正计划成立一个 "特别工作组"，让美国公司参与到减少从中国进口的进程中来。【原文：Mexico is planning to establish a “task force” to involve US companies in the process of reducing imports from China, the country’s economy minister told a group of auto suppliers at a private meeting Friday in Detroit.】

item.title: 中国资本账户外流创历史新高令人民币承压
item.description: 中国经济疲软、美元飙升和美国提高关税的前景已经给人民币造成了压力，人民币还面临着额外的下行压力：大量资金涌向海外投资。【原文：As if the yuan wasn’t already under pressure from the weak Chinese economy, a surging dollar and the prospect of higher US tariffs, the currency faces an additional downdraft: a flood of money looking to invest overseas.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税升级计划为何遭到如此多的仇视？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普承诺在其第二个美国总统任期内将进口税重新置于美国经济政策的中心位置。美国在历史上的大部分时期都对进口产品征收重税，但从 20 世纪 30 年代开始，随着政府领导人接受自由贸易的理念，美国基本上放弃了这一政策。在特朗普 2017-2021 年的总统任期内，关税卷土重来，他转向征收关税，以重振美国制造业，并对抗美国认为是中国的不公平贸易行为。【原文：Donald Trump is promising to put import taxes back at the center of US economic policy during his second term as US president. The country heavily taxed imports for much of its history before largely abandoning the policy, beginning in the 1930s, as government leaders embraced the idea of free trade. Tariffs made a comeback during Trump’s 2017-2021 presidency, when he turned to them in an effort to revitalize American manufacturing and counter what the US regards as China’s unfair trade practice】

item.title: 金佰利纸巾业务引起 RGE、Suzano 和 APP 的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，金佰利公司可能出售其国际生活用纸业务，这引起了包括 Royal Golden Eagle Pte、巴西 Suzano SA 和 Asia Pulp & Paper Co.【原文：Kimberly-Clark Corp.’s potential sale of its international tissue business has attracted interest from companies including Royal Golden Eagle Pte, Brazil’s Suzano SA and Asia Pulp & Paper Co., according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 飞机在雨中坠毁，亚马逊暂停无人机送货
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）的两架最新型无人机在测试设施的雨天坠毁后，该公司暂停了所有商业无人机送货。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is pausing all commercial drone deliveries after two of its latest models crashed in rainy weather at a testing facility.】

item.title: 耶伦称美国将采取非常措施避免违约
item.description: 即将卸任的财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，她的部门将从1月21日开始采取特殊会计手段，以避免突破美国债务上限，并再次敦促立法者采取措施提高或暂停法定上限。【原文：Outgoing Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said her department will start taking special accounting maneuvers as of Jan. 21 to avoid breaching the US debt limit, and urged lawmakers again to take steps to increase or suspend the statutory ceiling.】

item.title: 华尔街套期保值热潮在 2024 年失误后再起波澜
item.description: 在 2024 年欣欣向荣的市场中，最大的罪过就是怀疑主义。风险资产白热化的上涨，让那些疯狂购买华尔街兜售的对冲和分散风险的新产品的人苦不堪言。【原文：In the euphoric markets of 2024, the biggest sin was skepticism. A white-hot runup in risky assets made life miserable for anyone buying into the frenzy of fresh products that Wall Street was hawking to hedge and diversify.】

item.title: 力拓与嘉能可就曾是禁忌的交易交谈数月
item.description: 十年前，当嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）提议与力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）合并时，这家大公司仅用了几天时间就拒绝了。本周有消息称，两家公司在去年下半年花了几个月的时间进行谈判，这表明，就在巨额交易热席卷全球采矿业之际，形势已经发生了变化。【原文：When Glencore Plc proposed a combination with Rio Tinto Group a decade ago, the larger company turned it down after just a few days. News this week that the two spent several months in negotiations in the second half of last year shows how the sands have shifted, just as mega-deal fever sweeps the global mining industry.】

item.title: 特朗普上任前交易员押注美元走强
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之前，投机性货币交易商加大了美元走强的赌注。【原文：Speculative currency traders bolstered wagers for an even stronger US dollar in the leadup to President-elect Donald Trump’s return to the White House.】

item.title: 在特朗普接手之前，长期存在的加密货币案件正在逐渐减少
item.description: 数字货币集团（Digital Currency Group）及其子公司创世全球资本公司（Genesis Global Capital）周五就美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）的指控达成和解。【原文：Digital Currency Group and its subsidiary Genesis Global Capital settled Securities and Exchange Commission charges on Friday — the latest in a slew of crypto firms to do so as US regulators appear to clear their slates in the waining days of the Biden administration.】

item.title: 元心冲击》视频游戏制造商在美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）案件中赔偿 2,000 万美元
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周五表示，热门视频游戏《元气冲击》的制造商同意支付 2,000 万美元，以了结关于该公司在赢得抢手奖品的成本方面欺骗玩家的指控。【原文：The maker of the popular video game Genshin Impact agreed to pay $20 million to settle claims that it deceived players about the cost of winning sought-after prizes, the US Federal Trade Commission said Friday.】

item.title: 新泽西州官员在梅嫩德斯腐败案中洗脱罪名
item.description: 新泽西州总检察长办公室澄清了州执法官员在前美国参议员罗伯特-梅嫩德斯（Robert Menendez）腐败案中的不当行为。【原文：The New Jersey attorney general’s office cleared state law enforcement officials of wrongdoing in a corruption case involving former US Senator Robert Menendez, who awaits sentencing after his conviction last year.】
